title: aDimai ennai
sahitya:
aDimai ennai ANDavanE Ananda tANDavanE
aDimalar maravAda varam aruLvAi pughal yArumilai


anupallavi

  kaDimalar iTTEttip-paNinda kaNNapparukkaruL dayALA


caraNam    tirunIlakaNThanArkkum tirunALaip-pOvArkkum
tiruvaruL shei karuNaiyilOr tivalaiyaruL dEvEshA
tiruc- ciTrambalam tanilE tirunaTam shei naTarAjA
shivakAmi manOharaa rAmadAsan paNiyum iraivA
